contest-event.event-date:
May 25, 1912 D Lincoln Contest
Lincoln Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
lincoln-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Apollo
Whitehall Grounds, Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK
1st prize £5,and cup. 2nd prize £3. 3rd prize £2.
Best cornet and euphonium Bentley Colliery. Best Flugal Clowne. Best horn and conductors medal for best local band Ruston's. Best trombone Creswell Colliery.
March contest 1st (£1) Bentley Colliery, 2nd (10s.) Creswell Colliery.
12 bands competed.
May 7, 2012, 3:04 p.m. May 7, 2012, 3:27 p.m.
